<style>
  .navbox{
    position:fixed; bottom:12px; left:12px; z-index:99999;
    background:rgba(255,255,255,.92); padding:6px 10px; border-radius:8px;
    font:14px/1.2 system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Arial,sans-serif;
    box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.12)
  }
  .navbox a{ margin-right:10px; text-decoration:none; }
</style>

<div class="navbox">
  <a id="go-first" href="#1">First</a>
  <a id="go-last"  href="#">Last</a>
  <a id="go-dir"   href="../index.html">Directory</a>
</div>

<script>
(function () {
  function setLast(){
    if (window.slideshow && typeof slideshow.getSlideCount === 'function') {
      var last = slideshow.getSlideCount();
      document.getElementById('go-last').setAttribute('href', '#' + last);
    }
  }
  // try now, and again after slideshow is ready
  setLast();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', setLast);
})();
</script>
